abstract: Sallie Mae agreed late last night to be sold to J.P. Morgan Chase, Bank of America and two private equity firms for $25 billion. The deal, announced early Monday, would move the nation’s largest education lender, officially known as the SLM Corporation, into private control amid increasing turmoil for the company.
lead_paragraph: Sallie Mae agreed late last night to be sold to J.P. Morgan Chase, Bank of America and two private equity firms for $25 billion. The deal, announced early Monday, would move the nation’s largest education lender, officially known as the SLM Corporation, into private control amid increasing turmoil for the company.

headline.main: Sallie Mae Agrees to Be Sold for $25 Billion
